blog.name: main-redironrouge
blog.title: I'm just a loser who writes fanfic
blog.description: Welcome to my trash bin of a blog. Eyyyy.

summary: Everyone is so mad about Deku inheriting all the quirks of the previous users, saying "it makes him too OP!" Like, what manga...
body:
Everyone is so mad about Deku inheriting all the quirks of the previous users, saying “it makes him too OP!” Like, what manga have you been reading? OF COURSE IT DOES. He’s literally meant to be OP.

“It makes all the side characters pointless.”

Why? It’s been shown multiple times that All Might literally makes every other hero useless in the series. He was taking all their work until his retirement. Wanna know WHY those side characters aren’t useless just because Deku got more quirks? BECAUSE DEKU IS ONE PERSON AND HE CAN’T BE EVERYWHERE. Side characters are still just as important, but this is a story about DEKU.

“Now he’s more powerful than All Might ever was.”

All Might is the #1 hero OF JAPAN. Japan. Not the world. JAPAN. The first episode literally has Deku saying how this is a story of his journey to becoming the greatest hero IN THE WORLD. Don’t act like y'all didn’t already see how he was going to blow All Might out of the water from episode god damn 1, my dudes.

“Everyone else’s journeys are pointless, because they could never compare to his quirk now.”

They couldn’t compare before. Nobody could compare to All Might before Deku got his power. Literally thinking other heroes lose purpose because of this IS YOUR OWN THINKING. Everyone accepted they’d never compare to All Might. Even Endeavor did, hence his quirk marriage and kids. That didn’t stop them from being important or useful side characters.

Like, everyone can be upset, because opinions. But most of these reasons for being upset is people taking importance away from other characters by their own choice and then getting mad about it. These kids aren’t trying to be heroes to surpass Midoriya, they’re trying to be heroes for their own reasons. Reasons that are endearing on their own. Not everyone is striving to be the #1 hero and Bakugou’s rivaly already seems to be moving into “pushing Deku to be better so he isn’t an embarrassment to All Might” territory rather than Bakugou wanting to truly be #1. I’m sure he still strives to be the best, but if Deku was #1 I doubt that would destroy him. I feel like he’d accept #2 a lot better than, say, Endeavor.

Also, my boi Shinso looking lively as hell this chapter. It’s a disgrace that so little people are focusing on this boy’s golden ass smile.
